history.text: To start out. I loved The Avengers
Yes it was good.
To be honest, the newer improved Marvel films blow it out of the water, but a fine film
It got reviews too. It has a 8/10 on rotten tomatoes.
Yes it was good for it's time.
I liked Scarlett Johansson as Natasha Romanoff / Black Widow.

I am glad that the same trillion celebrities get to continue to make trillions of dollars pretending to be people. They deserve it because they were built with the correct bodies and we are stupid slaves.
These people would never take 2 minutes out of their day to watch me do something but I need to watch everything they do for eternity.
Thats so impressive for a superhero film! In a way you are correct, but they got to that point because they are all incredible actores
The Iron Man was a real teamplayer and im happy they wrote the film in that direction
Yes, it had nothing to do with any other factors. There are people curing diseases, but people who pretend to be other people make 1000x more money than them because they try harder than scientists.
When Walt Disney bought this Franchise I knew great things would come about from it
Yes good thing they keep using resources on these movies while people starve to death.
I liked the beginning when Loki encountered the Other.
Because they pretend on a gigantic screen and millions watch because they are good films
That was a solid scene.
If only there were real avengers who could make sure nobody is homeless.
A temporary vacation. And The Avengers film knocked it out of the ballpark for its time
That is what I think about watching this movie.
The good thing about super hero movies is they inspire people to think about helping others and overcoming impossible odds.
What i was thinking about was how good their next films will be
I heard that Black Panther is about to take this franchise to the next level

I liked how Loki didn't just want to take people out he wanted to validate himself so he wanted to publicly
 take people out.
That was one of the finest scenes in the movie
There are so many parellels to this film and reality, oddly enough
It was definitely cool. Then they opened a wormhole above Stark Tower.
I felt they could've worked on Black Widows and Hawkeyes character with alot more dialogue
Yes they made more films that went into more didn't they?
Somewhat. Ultron gave them all a weird nightmarish state to be in that took them to another time in their life
I liked when Stark intercepted the missle and takes it through the wormhole. That was a smooth movie.
Oh yeah they all had is going in this film. It was one of the best action films of all time i hear
Then Thor returns Loki and the Tesseract to Asgard. Good for him. Thor was cool.
Thor has really come into his own after the most recent movie. In this one though he just trying to calm Hulk down haha
It is good that they let us know that if needed the Avengers will return.
